Class BetterSellerAgent

java.lang.Object
  |

              +--marketplace.BetterSellerAgent
public class BetterSellerAgent
extends SellerAgent

The BetterSellerAgent class implements a seller agent that uses hard-coded logic when negotiating.

See Also:
